attributes.action: set up a national agency which will redevelop all waste fill sites in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A enormous amount of recyclable material sits in this nations waste fill sites.  This includes, steel, iron, lead, tin, glass, oil, plastic etc.  If this country is to avoid the shortages of ALL non-renewable materials in the next 100 years then it is time we did something about it and started reusing centuries of waste.
